document.full_text: egypt's foreign minister was confirmed as the arab league's next chief on sunday to lead the organization amid unprecedented turmoil in the region after last minute diplomacy left him as the only candidate in the race.
document.title: egypt to lead arab league amid regional turmoil
lines_and_colors: egypt's foreign minister was confirmed as the arab league's next chief on sunday to lead the organization amid unprecedented turmoil in the region after last minute diplomacy left him as the only candidate in the race.
